ul.li1: 1“Listen to me, you who pursue righteousness,
ul.li2: who seek Yahweh.
ul.li1: Look to the rock from which you were hewn,
ul.li2: and to the excavation of the pit from which you were quarried.

ul.li2: and to Sarah; she brought you forth.
